title: Controllable synthesis of high-entropy alloys
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,6021-6041
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00034J, Tutorial Review
Jingjing Liang, Guanghui Cao, Mengqi Zeng, Lei Fu
This review provides a comprehensive overview of the recent advancements in the controllable synthesis of high-entropy alloys, ranging from the approach and significance of composition, morphology, structure, and surface/interface engineering.
